Festival of Colors Premium Timed Research Ticket
Greetings. Lapras and I were just finishing our latest analysis.
A well-balanced approach has proven productive not only in battle, but in other areas as well.
We have you to thank, %PLAYERNAME%. Your assistance has allowed us to achieve another breakthrough.
Ah, %PLAYERNAME%. You should know that Cliff has declared his intention to become “the most balanced Trainer ever.”
I can’t say I’m enthused about an enemy improving his skills, but at least you kept him in check when his reckless training methods could have caused trouble.
I genuinely appreciate your support in that matter.
Yo, %PLAYERNAME%! I just wrapped up an intense solo mission.
I’m still warming up to going solo, but I learn a lot from it, too. Plus, it makes me appreciate being with my team even more.
Thanks for everything. Here’s to always being ready to help each other out, whether we’re together or apart!
Hey, what’d you say to Arlo earlier? I’ve been hearing he’s working closely with the Grunts—like, cooperatively! That doesn’t sound like him at all.
It’s a shame they’re probably getting up to no good. Team GO Rocket are the champs of misplaced passion, huh?
Anyhow, thanks for handling him. Whatever they try to pull in the future, we’ll stop them together!
Wild to think how this all kicked off with a beach retreat, huh? I guess things are always going a little haywire around you though, so I can’t say I’m surprised!
You’re totally invited to my next hang. Anyways, thanks for always being down for an adventure!
Hey, thanks for keeping an eye on Sierra earlier, %PLAYERNAME%.
She usually gives everybody a real cold shoulder, so I’m kinda surprised she went easy on you! ...A little easy.
She’s still super mean, and, y’know, evil, but hey—we’ll know just how to stop her next time she stirs up trouble!
This is incredible... I have read about Absofusion, but I never dared to dream I would witness it firsthand.
What about you? Did you ever think you would see something so amazing?
People are so passionate about their dreams. I used to wonder if our differences were irreconcilable, but this has shown me that we all complement each other when we are united.
I do not know if I will be around long enough to see the future Kyurem awaits, but I am excited to work with you to make it a reality.
Pokémon Presents ’25 x GO Tour Timed Research
Pokémon Presents ’25 x GO Tour Timed Research (1/1)

Purchase the Tour Pass Deluxe to unlock the following rewards! • An encounter with Victini • One Lucky Trinket, which allows you to instantly become Lucky Friends with a friend of your choice • Fusion Energy for Kyurem • The Kyurem Helmet avatar item • And much more! Trainers can earn 150 bonus points daily from February 24 to 28 in addition to the points earned by Pass Tasks. There’s no limit on how many points can be earned during the global event on March 1 and 2!
A ticket to access Pokémon GO Fest 2025: Global on June 28 and June 29, 2025, wherever you are.

A ticket to access Pokémon GO Fest 2025: Global on June 28 and June 29, 2025, wherever you are. Details can be found in the in-game News.

You must play during the specified time to receive all the event bonuses.

5 surprise encounters with Fuecoco in GO Snapshot
It’s said that this Pokémon battles in order to protect the ideal world that will exist in the future for people and Pokémon.
The sameness of Reshiram’s and Kyurem’s genes allowed Kyurem to absorb Reshiram. Kyurem can now use the power of both fire and ice.
Battle Team GO Rocket members on {0} different days
I’ve got to tell you, after all the excitement we’ve seen lately, things going back to normal feels like a different kind of extreme.
I suppose adventures have two sides: a beginning and an end.
It all comes back to balance. An end to one beginning, and now we’re ready to begin again!
In any case, thanks for all the help, %PLAYERNAME%. Whatever destiny holds, I trust you’ll make the right choices and succeed, no matter how different the paths might seem!
Ah, great timing! The data our friends helped us gather led me to detect and pinpoint a potent freezing energy.
And the source? None other than Kyurem, a Legendary Pokémon whose frozen body produces ultracold air.
Intriguingly, Kyurem is closely associated with two other Pokémon, Reshiram and Zekrom. Each of them seems to have distinct perspectives: one focused on truth, the other on ideals.
It reminds me of the strange phenomena we’ve been seeing lately. These Legendary Pokémon must be connected to it all somehow.
You’d better be ready though, %PLAYERNAME%. Kyurem is no pushover, and I have a feeling you’ll be facing it before long!
One guaranteed Rare Candy XL when catching five-star Raid Bosses during a Raid Hour (Trainers level 31+)
More Fuecoco are appearing in the wild!
Collected stamp from {0} for Stamp Rally: {1}
Go to one of the stamp rally locations to claim this reward.
Collect {0} stamps to encounter a Pokémon and receive other rewards
Collect 1 stamp to encounter a Pokémon and receive other rewards
Collect {0} stamps to encounter a Pokémon
Collect 1 stamp to encounter a Pokémon
Hi there, %PLAYERNAME%! You’re just the person I was looking for!
We’ve had a whole mess of Team GO Rocket Grunts hanging around lately. I even heard some of them bragging about finding a Dynamax Pokémon!
I shudder to think of what it could mean if those miscreants actually got their mitts on it! Would you mind checking things out?
I know that if push comes to shove, you’ll show them who’s boss!
My hypothesis was correct—you sent those pesky Grunts packing! Well done, my friend!
And I see you were able to catch the Pokémon they had their eyes on, too: a Kubfu that can Dynamax!
You see that long white hair on its head? Supposedly, if Kubfu pulls on it, it makes its fighting spirit heighten and power well up from the depths of its belly!
I think it recognized your skill and wants to join you on your journey so it can get stronger. No surprise, really—you made quick work of those Team GO Rocket troublemakers.
So go on, get to adventuring and help Kubfu reach its full potential!

Includes: • One additional Candy XL for completing raids and Max Battles • 3× XP awarded for your first spin and first catch each day • Hold 2× as many Gifts in your Item Bag (40 total) • Timed Research that awards 50,000 XP and 50,000 Stardust • And more!
Included rewards: • Premium in-game items, such as a Premium Battle Pass, a Charged TM, and Rare Candies • Encounters with Fuecoco with a Special Background • And more!

Included rewards: • Encounters with Teddiursa, Tyrogue, Cubchoo, Pancham, Stufful, and Dynamax Kubfu • 2 Premium Battle Passes • 3 Kubfu Candy XL • 30 Kubfu Candy • 5 Rare Candies • 1 Star Piece • 1 Incense • 2,000 XP and 3,000 Stardust • And more!

Included rewards: • Encounters with Bruxish • 2 Lure Modules • 2 Incense • 2,000 Stardust Bruxish found in reward encounters for this research and all other research tasks are more likely to be Shiny!

Includes: • An encounter with the Mythical Pokémon Volcanion • A higher chance to encounter Shiny Pokémon during the event • Up to 9 free Raid Passes each day from spinning Gym Photo Discs • Event-themed Pokémon hatching from 5 km Eggs • Incense may attract special Pokémon • Branching Special Research focused on Zacian or Zamazenta • Additional Special Trades for a daily total of 6 • 50% Stardust cost for trades • A Collection Challenge for each habitat • Additional daily snapshot surprises • Double the buddy hearts • Hourly Global Challenges to unlock additional bonuses Additional content: • Purchase by April 15 and play between April 8 and April 15 for Timed Research that awards an encounter with Skiddo!
